activities:
We provide an email marketing platform for use by our clients around the world. For clients in the the EU they will be entering into our product the email address and details for their contacts they whish to send email marketing to. The contact information that can be entered, at a minimum, is the email address, in addition to that they can also enter the following fields: 

First name
Last name
Company
Job Title
Gender (male/female)
Title
Salutation
Date of birth
Address 1
Address 2
City
State
Postcode
Country
Phone
Mobile
Fax
Email format (plain text/html)
eucountries: France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We are committed to working with EU data protection authorities in the event an issue or complaint is received. We also provide tools in our application to allow users to submit requests to have their contact data purged from our system. This also extends to the contacts themselves who can request to have their information removed.
